summary: Completed testing of PlanEd new features: Mathe-Schulbücher (24 books), Fach-Dropdown, Excel Import Button, and Auth-Routes. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Auth: Login with valid credentials (abusse@gmx.net / LASP2026!)
Auth: Login with invalid credentials returns 401
Mathe Schulbücher: API returns 25 books (24 + kein_schulbuch)
Mathe Schulbücher: Klassenstufe 5/6 filter returns 9 books
Mathe Schulbücher: Klassenstufe 7/8 filter returns 9 books (includes new Mathe Live 7-8, Neue Wege 7-8)
Mathe Schulbücher: Klassenstufe 9/10 filter returns 9 books (includes new Mathe Live 9-10, Neue Wege 9-10)
Mathe Schulbücher: All 4 publishers present (Westermann, Klett, Cornelsen, Schroedel)
Mathe Struktur: All Klassenstufen have valid Kompetenzbereiche with Themen
Frontend: Fach-Dropdown switches between Deutsch and Mathematik
Frontend: Subtitle updates correctly (Deutsch RS+ / Mathematik RS+)
Frontend: Klassenstufe dropdown shows correct options (Kl. 5/6, Kl. 7/8, Kl. 9/10)
Frontend: Excel Import Button (data-testid='excel-import-btn') visible on Arbeitsplan page
Frontend: Excel Import file input (data-testid='excel-import-input') present
critical_code_review_comments: Auth routes successfully extracted to /app/backend/routes/auth.py - clean separation of concerns
Mathe Schulbücher data file (/app/backend/data/schulbuecher_mathe.py) contains all 24 books with proper structure
New book series added: Mathe Live (Cornelsen) 5-10, Mathematik Neue Wege (Schroedel) 5-10
Frontend CurriculumPlannerPage.js correctly handles Fach switching with API path adjustment
Excel Import Button properly integrated with file input and API endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working correctly: 1) Mathe-Schulbücher API returns 24 books (Sekundo, Schnittpunkt, Mathe Live, Neue Wege series) plus 'kein_schulbuch' option. 2) Fach-Dropdown on /curriculum page switches between Deutsch and Mathematik, loading correct Lehrplan structure. 3) Excel Import Button visible on Arbeitsplan page with proper data-testid attributes. 4) Auth routes successfully extracted to separate file. Backend tests created in /app/tests/test_planed_features.py for regression testing.
